data.prayer: Over 2 percent of the people of Johnston are far from Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Johnston, United States Minor Outlying Islands
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Johnston
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Johnston, United States Minor Outlying Islands the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Johnston, United States Minor Outlying Islands with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 40 believers in the state of Johnston to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Johnston, United States Minor Outlying Islands.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Johnston.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.focus_label: Johnston, United States Minor Outlying Islands
